channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - gse

item.title: Talk about SELinux on GSE Linux/Security
item.description: On today's GSE Linux / GSE Security meeting (in cooperation with IMUG) I gave a small (30 minutes) presentation about what SELinux is. The slides are online and cover two aspects of SELinux: some of its design principles, and then a set of features provided by SELinux. The talk is directed …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: GSE TWS BeLux 2010
item.description:
Today, IBM generously hosted the GSE TWS BeLux 2010 conference. Although it was organized together with the GSE DB2 conference (which I would also have loved to attend) I must say I was pretty impressed with the topics given, especially those after the lunch.

For me, personally, the topic on …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
